Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Human Meteor and Initial Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Human Meteor and sets up the initial underwater conflict and Duke O'Dowd's dual identity.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Introduction
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Human Meteor in an underwater setting, encountering divers and hinting at a looming threat.

sub_scenes.title: Taxi Ride and Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: Duke O'Dowd, as a taxi driver, picks up suspicious passengers and becomes aware of being followed, shifting the scene to land and introducing intrigue.

narrative_arcs.title: Taxi Ride to the Waterfront and Suspicion
Arrival at the Pier and Transformation

sub_scenes.title: Street Confrontation and Hospital
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor confronts perceived threats, leading to a conflict and subsequent hospitalisation, where a new plot involving a yacht and submarine is revealed.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Revelation of Yacht and Submarine Plot
Duke's Plan and Toby's Stowaway Mission

Major_Arcs.title: Uncovering the Submarine Plot on the Yacht
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the investigation of the yacht and the submarine threat, featuring observations, discoveries, and underwater action.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Observation and Stowaway
sub_scenes.description: Pete's initial observations of the yacht and Duke's (as Toby) stowaway mission to investigate the depth chart.

narrative_arcs.title: Depth Chart Discovery and Sudden Fall

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Investigation and Torpedoes
sub_scenes.description: Namor's urgent dive and underwater discovery of the sunken submarine and torpedo loading operation.

narrative_arcs.title: Sunken Submarine Discovery and Underwater Encounter

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Combat and Ship Attack
sub_scenes.description: Namor engages in underwater combat with divers, leading to a torpedo attack on the ship and a diver's escape.

narrative_arcs.title: Subduing a Diver and Submarine's Evasion
Confrontation with the Red Suit Diver and Underwater Struggle
Namor's Surface Attack on the Ship with Torpedo

Major_Arcs.title: Aftermath and Betrayal Revelation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc deals with the immediate aftermath of the underwater conflict, revealing Peter's betrayal and the resolution of the immediate threat.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Pursuit and Peter's Death
sub_scenes.description: Namor pursues the yacht, discovers Peter's body, and shipboard confirmation of Peter's death.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Peter in Diving Helmet

sub_scenes.title: Investigation and Espionage
sub_scenes.description: Investigation into Peter's cabin reveals his connection to the Jap Navy, followed by hospital visit and Duke/Toby returning home after the day's events.

narrative_arcs.title: Investigation in Peter's Cabin and Jap Navy Connection
Confirmation of Peter's Double Life and Swift Action
Driving Toby Home After a Long Day
Arriving Home and Mother's Concern for Toby

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads and the Ambulance Incident
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new storyline with the Liberty Lads confronting Nazi Fiends and the mystery surrounding an ambulance arrival.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the Liberty Lads confronting Nazi Fiends with guns and threats.

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance Arrival and Observation
sub_scenes.description: Boys observe an ambulance approaching, sparking curiosity and concern about its destination.

sub_scenes.title: Wallet Clue and Garage Destination
sub_scenes.description: Boys find a dropped wallet with a garage address, leading them to a new location for investigation.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dropped Wallet and Garage Clue

Major_Arcs.title: Garage Mystery and Mr. Horst Encounter
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the boys' investigation at the garage and their encounter with Major Bronson and Mr. Horst.

sub_scenes.title: Garage Observation and Major Bronson
sub_scenes.description: Boys observe a marine saluting a civilian near the garage, revealing Major Bronson and adding to the mystery.

narrative_arcs.title: Marine Salute and Major Bronson's Civilian Clothes

sub_scenes.title: Interception and Journey to Mr. Horst
sub_scenes.description: Boys are intercepted by police and taken to meet Mr. Horst, setting up a confrontational encounter.

sub_scenes.title: Capture by Mr. Horst
sub_scenes.description: Boys are captured by Mr. Horst, who assesses them, creating suspense about his intentions.

Major_Arcs.title: Interrogation and Bronson's Intervention
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the interrogation of the boys by Mr. Horst and the dramatic intervention by Major Bronson to rescue them.

sub_scenes.title: Wallet Interrogation and Threat
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Horst interrogates the boys about the wallet, escalating tension with accusations and violent threats from his henchmen.

sub_scenes.title: Carbon Monoxide Plan and Flashback
sub_scenes.description: A sinister carbon monoxide plan is devised for the boys, contrasted with a flashback showing their initial capture.

sub_scenes.title: Escalating Threat and Violent Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Horst escalates his threats with a gun, prompting Major Bronson's violent intervention and a chaotic fight.

Major_Arcs.title: Escape, Marines, and Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the boys' escape, the arrival of the Marines, and the resolution of the conflict with the Nazi spy ring.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Help and Waterfront
sub_scenes.description: Boys decide to split up to seek help, leading one to the waterfront and the discovery of a secret office.

narrative_arcs.title: Boys Head to Waterfront for Help

sub_scenes.title: Marine Barracks and Office Fight
sub_scenes.description: Scene shifts to Marine Barracks with a car crash, and Skip defending himself in an office before Bronson intervenes.

sub_scenes.title: Marines Arrival and Victory
sub_scenes.description: Marines arrive to rescue, engage in a fight, and the Major is praised for dismantling the Nazi spy ring.

narrative_arcs.title: The Marines Engage in a Scrap
Urgent Medical Aid for the Major

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and South American Intrigue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new protagonist, The Champ, and shifts the setting to South America, initiating a new adventure against 'Hitler tools'.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of The Champ
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of The Champ and Henry, setting up their adventures against 'Hitler tools' in a Wild West style.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Setting the Scene

sub_scenes.title: Arrival in South America and Initial Encounter
sub_scenes.description: The Champ and Henry arrive in South America and are immediately confronted by local authorities.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in a Sleepy South American Town

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Dismissal
sub_scenes.description: The Champ is interrogated by officers about Rosita, then abruptly dismissed, leading him to seek the American Consul for answers.

Major_Arcs.title: El Tigre and the Rescue of Rosita
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the kidnapping of Rosita by El Tigre and the unfolding rescue mission to save her from Axis agents.

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Demands and Forced Journey
sub_scenes.description: Exposition of El Tigre's demands for ransom and gasoline, followed by a forced car journey to a house.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Revelation at the House

sub_scenes.title: Clarification and Hideout Approach
sub_scenes.description: Clarification of the situation at the house, followed by the approach to El Tigre's hideout and infiltration using a diversion.

Major_Arcs.title: Hideout Search and Shifting Alliances
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the search for Rosita within the hideout, internal conflict among villains, and shifting alliances.

sub_scenes.title: Hideout Humiliation and Search for Rosita
sub_scenes.description: Humiliation of a character and desperate search for Rosita within the hideout, leading to interrogation.

sub_scenes.title: Internal Dispute and Rescue Mission
sub_scenes.description: Internal dispute over El Tigre, followed by urgent news of Rosita's location and the initiation of a rescue mission.

Major_Arcs.title: Rosita's Rescue and Champ's Recognition
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the rescue operation to save Rosita from Axis forces, leading to combat and eventual recognition for Senor Champ.

sub_scenes.title: Pursuit and Hotel Entry
sub_scenes.description: Pursuit of Axis forces, planning and executing entry into a hotel to rescue Rosita.

narrative_arcs.title: Pursuit and Initial Attack on Axis Forces
Seeking Refuge and Planning Entry via Rear

sub_scenes.title: Hotel Combat and Heroic Recognition
sub_scenes.description: Intense combat within the hotel, Rosita's bravery, and eventual recognition and gratitude for Senor Champ's heroic actions.

narrative_arcs.title: Machine Gun Deployment and Presidential Orders
Gratitude for Life-Saving Bravery and Recognition
Arrival of Government Troops and Search for Rosita

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in the Jungle
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting, involving jungle combat, betrayal, and new alliances.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Grave Report
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan engages in jungle combat with spies and receives a grave report about disobedience and compromised plans.

narrative_arcs.title: Grave Report and Canal Zone Discussion
Dolan's Displeasure and Sub Detector Plans

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Tracking and Attack
sub_scenes.description: Dolan tracks someone into the jungle, narrowly evades a dart attack, and faces a swarm of native warriors.

Major_Arcs.title: Capture and Forced Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the capture and interrogation of individuals, leading to a coerced betrayal under threat.

sub_scenes.title: Capture and Interrogation
sub_scenes.description: Captured men are brought before a sinister figure and interrogated about plans, under threat of violence.

narrative_arcs.title: Fatherland's Demand and Hot Iron Threat

Major_Arcs.title: Fire, Fight, and Service Spanking
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc involves Dolan expressing regret, a fiery diversion, a jungle fight leading to a new alliance, and a disciplinary action for Dolan.

sub_scenes.title: Regret and Impending Action
sub_scenes.description: Dolan expresses regret, and a man in suit orders immediate action, setting up a new conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Surprise and Native Alliance
sub_scenes.description: Dolan encounters natives in the jungle, leading to a fight and a surprising alliance based on the chief's betrayal.

sub_scenes.title: Shipboard Surrender and American Brawl
sub_scenes.description: Ship captain decides to surrender, leading to a surprise encounter and a brawl with nationalistic undertones.

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins and the Murder Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new story featuring the Twinkle Twins as reporters investigating a murder mystery.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Twinkle Twins
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the Twinkle Twins and their backstory as ordinary people turned fighters against ruthless killers.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of the Twinkle Twins Story

sub_scenes.title: Newspaper Assignment and Initial Investigation
sub_scenes.description: Twinkle Twins are assigned to investigate a banker's murder, starting their investigation at the newspaper office and police station.

narrative_arcs.title: Information from Sailor and Headquarters Decision
Police Station Inquiry and Hospital Lead
Press Passes and Revelation of Sick Child

Major_Arcs.title: Candy Store Call and Roadblock Confrontation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the Twinkle Twins as they follow leads, confront roadblocks, and witness street violence related to their investigation.

sub_scenes.title: Candy Store Call and New Lead
sub_scenes.description: Twinkle Twins use a candy store phone to call for information, leading them to the Irish section of town to search for Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Candy Store Phone Call and New Lead
Arrival in the Irish Section and Pursuit of Reilly

sub_scenes.title: Irish Section Search and Mrs. Murphy's Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Twinkle Twins search the Irish section, gaining information from locals and learning the truth from Mrs. Murphy about Reilly and Farnacci.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Information in the Irish Section

sub_scenes.title: Getaway, Chase, and Roadblock Brawl
sub_scenes.description: A getaway, taxi chase, and confrontation at a roadblock lead to a street brawl and police intervention.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and De-escalation at the Roadblock

Major_Arcs.title: Aftermath, Medical Emergency, and Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc resolves the immediate crisis with medical aid, community support, and the capture of Farnacci, leading to a celebratory resolution.

sub_scenes.title: Police Action and Hospital Wait
sub_scenes.description: Police action aftermath, emergency medical response, and anxious wait at the hospital for news on the injured.

narrative_arcs.title: Emergency Medical Response and Hospital Wait
Blood Transfusion Need and Community Blood Drive

sub_scenes.title: Blood Drive and Transfusion Success
sub_scenes.description: Community blood drive is initiated, leading to successful blood transfusion for Tom Reilly and his recovery.

narrative_arcs.title: Blood Type Matching and Transfusion Preparation
Blood Transfusion in Progress and Doctor's Reassurance

sub_scenes.title: Farnacci's Capture and Birthday Celebration
sub_scenes.description: Plan to capture Farnacci is executed, leading to his forced blood donation and a birthday celebration for Reilly's daughter, marking a happy ending.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Farnacci's Blood and Police Plan
Police Raid and Arrest of Farnacci
Birthday Celebration for Reilly's Daughter's Recovery
